name: Healer (itch)
description:
Keep your teammates alive during 3 thematic boss fights, while discovering new spells. 

Use the arrows to select your group member and AZSX for spells. Be aware of the text on top left for information on the fight, and the codex on bottom left for some hints.

This minigame was made for a one-day game-jam using TIC-80 (Lua) at University of Montpellier, by myself.

For the record:
Best scores for each boss: 40, 53, 49
Best run: 40, 49, 47 (=136)
